tool_description: HTML/URL to PDF converter. Stop yak-shaving, generate a PDF now! https://yakpdf.com
name: yakpdf - HTML to PDF
title: yakpdf - HTML to PDF

api_list.name: post-pdf
api_list.description: Generate a PDF from a URL or HTML string.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yakpdf.p.rapidapi.com/pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yakpdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yakpdf.p.rapidapi.com/pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yakpdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
